Based on your preferences, I would recommend "Django Unchained" and "Rob Roy". These two movies are highly recommended based on their similar themes of revenge and survival.

"Django Unchained" is a thrilling action-adventure film directed by Quentin Tarantino. The movie tells the story of Django Unchained, an escaped slave who teams up with a German bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi. The movie stars actors like Kenny Baker, Peter Cushing, Harrison Ford.

Rob Roy is a historical adventure film directed by William Smith. The movie tells the story of Rob Roy MacGregor, an Scottish warrior who leads a small group of mercenaries against the English army during the Wars of Scottish Independence.
